scripts.dev: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t browserify-css -t babelify js/scripts/app.js -o public/scripts/bundle.js; sed -i 's/node_modules\/bootstrap\/dist/assets/g' public/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.watch: ./node_modules/.bin/watchify -t browserify-css -t babelify js/scripts/app.js -o public/scripts/bundle.js & sed -i 's/node_modules\/bootstrap\/dist/assets/g' public/scripts/bundle.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production ./node_modules/.bin/browserify -t browserify-css -t babelify -p [ uglifyify --no-sourcemap ] js/scripts/app.js | terser --compress --mangle > public/scripts/bundle.js; sed -i 's/node_modules\/bootstrap\/dist/assets/g' public/scripts/bundle.js
